course_name: Occupational Therapy for Children & Youth I for Graduates
description: This course addresses occupational therapy practice for children, youth & their families, in relation to a range of developmental, attentional & learning conditions that impact on children's occupational performance & participation. Frames of reference for addressing these issues will be introduced along with appropriate information gathering methods, interventions & models of service delivery. It will also address the participation of children & youth in relation to their home, school and community environments.
